verbose_text: Although SARS PLpro enhanced ERK1 degradation via activation of ubiquitin-proteasomal system and inhibited phosphorylation of STAT1 Ser727 in type I IFN signaling pathway, PLpro did not affect amount and activation of ERK2 in human promonocyte cells 16.
evidence: SARS PLpro-enhanced ERK1 degradation via activation of ubiquitin-proteasomal system and inhibited phosphorylation of STAT1 Ser727
